column2: This refers to various types of tops, including but not limited to blouses, sweaters, hoodies, T-shirts
It refers to bottoms, such as trousers, skirts, and shorts.
A one-piece jumpsuit combines the top and bottom clothing into a single garment
It is a type of coat, typically longer in length, used for warmth and added style.
It refers to a dress, a one-piece garment consisting of a combined top and bottom.
